thread.title: TWIN Expands into Portugal and Angola
thread.title_full: TWIN Expands into Portugal and Angola | Travelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: TWIN Expands into Portugal and Angola
text:
TWIN Expands into Portugal and Angola Published on : Tuesday, August 4, 2015
TRAVELSAVERS Worldwide Independent Network (TWIN), a leading global travel management company, has expanded its presence into Portugal and Luanda, Angola with the signing of Cosmos-Viagens e Turismo, SA, a prominent agency in the corporate and sports travel area.
“Cosmos is a very unique DMC and we couldn’t be more excited to welcome them to TWIN. They have 28 years of experience and have been increasing their offering and client base every year. They understand what it means to commit to meeting the professional and personal needs of clients, something that is invaluable in the travel industry,” says Rick Mazza, President and CEO of TRAVELSAVERS Worldwide Independent Network. “We are thrilled to have them in our family.”
Cosmos specializes in business travel, incentives, meetings, conferences, congresses, sports tourism and private leisure travel. They also plan tours and thematic itineraries. The group specializes in the organization and management of sporting events throughout their locations in Portugal, Spain and Angola. Part of their service commitment is a dedicated account manager who provides local support to travelers. In addition, they are the official travel partners for the Portugal Football Federation, as well as other clubs, federations and associations.
“We are delighted to be working with TWIN and are even more excited that we are the company’s first agency entrance into Portugal and Luanda, Angola. Cosmos has grown tremendously in the past 28 years and with the TWIN network we can achieve even greater global growth and excellence for the next 28 years,” says Fátima Caeiro, Sales & Marketing Director, Cosmos – Viagens e Turismo, SA.
Source: TWIN
